item.title: are you a skier, climber, runner...? 😂🔗 Link in bio to join @oak_app mountain community - meet up wi
item.description: are you a skier, climber, runner...? 😂🔗 Link in bio to join @oak_app mountain community - meet up with new mountain partners in your favourite sports! 🌍(skiing, climbing, hiking, mountaineering, alpinism, trail running!)#mountainlyfe @mammut

item.title: Petit mur d’escalade en mode créatif 🔫14.10.2025 - 8h54 : Le plus beau vol de ma vie « Mais quelle d
item.description: Petit mur d’escalade en mode créatif 🔫14.10.2025 - 8h54 : Le plus beau vol de ma vie « Mais quelle dinguerie !!! » C’est ce que j’ai répété au moins 10 fois pendant le vol 😂Ce moment suspendu hors du temps, restera gravé à jamais 🧗Que du positif, de A jusqu’à Z.. enfin ! J’ai pris autant de plaisir durant l’amont, que pendant. Je suis heureux. Encore sur mon nuage. J’ai pas encore les mots... C’est une idée que j’ai eu en découvrant le monde de la montgolfière. En découvrant ce monde, j’ai découvert une espèce de nouvelle passion. Et quoi de mieux que de mélanger deux passions ? J’ai décidé de me pencher dessus le jour de mon dernier projet en highline, et je crois que j’ai bien fait ! Déjà hâte de la suite 🫠Mille mercis à tous ceux qui ont gravité autour du projet. Merci pour votre confiance, votre motivation et votre enthousiasme envers cette aventure qui m’a tant fait vibrer ! Un grand merci à la @compagniedesballons, pour votre professionnalisme, votre confiance et surtout vos sourires ! C’est le début d’une belle aventure qui commence 🤝Bisous les potes 😘🤜🤛 @will_snt @ninian_be mes chefs constructeurs, @fredblvg mon master sécu, et tous les autres 🥰🫶 @djiglobal @mammut @mammut.france @lasportivagram @lasportivafrance @cardosystems @space_bloc @izipizi @mauris.bois @artlineholds @compagniedesballons 📸 @leo_pernin @kennycerou @julienfaure_photographe @thomascerato #climbing #skydive #worldfirst #worldrecord #quedukiff

item.description: MotivAcción 8c ✅Our youngest ambassador @sebastian_climbs_the_world is on fire 🔥 At 11 years old, Sebastian manages to send his first 8c in Segovia, Spain! Congrats Sebastian, it‘s such a pleasure to watch you climb! 🧗 📷: @babygginsta

item.title: First time FIS Freeride World Champions in 26’ and the season has already started 🫡The event will ha
item.description: First time FIS Freeride World Champions in 26’ and the season has already started 🫡The event will happen February 26‘ in Andorra @ordinoarcalis and will be a first „World Champs“ event for Freeride history.I qualified through the NSA quota to represent 🇩🇪 which is also new.Super curious and exited to meet shredders from around the world for this event and live up the spirit for our „sport“ together 🙏📷 @domdaher @jeremy_bernard_photography

item.description: Julien takes bouldering to new Heights, literally 🎈 @leslignesdeju Images: @julienfaure_photographe / @bythomascerato

item.title: Tarragó, 8b+ max., 240m in a day ✅ FFA [🇫🇷 in the comments]This route is unique. 5 pitches : 6b, 8b,
item.description: Tarragó, 8b+ max., 240m in a day ✅ FFA [🇫🇷 in the comments]This route is unique. 5 pitches : 6b, 8b, 8a, 8b+, 7c+/8a. The rock isn’t exactly perfect though : dusty, fragile conglomerate, holds breaking every other try… But the climbing is super athletic and sustained, on a massive overhang, surrounded by the magical landscape of Montserrat (Catalunya). I thought I’d be able to send it pretty quickly. No crazy hard moves, and the style seemed to fit me well. But it turned out to be way harder than expected! After working each pitch separately, on my first ground-up go, I fell at the very top of pitch 4 (8b+). The following days, I couldn’t even get past the first crux of the 8b+, after fighting my way through pitch 2 (8b), which I only sometimes sent on my second try. Last October 15th, after a day of rain, the rock was still slightly humid. I sent P1-3, then made it through the first crux of P4, getting close to the spot where I’d fallen on day one… Suddenly, I was hanging in the rope again, a hold broke in my hand. The situation felt hopeless. Failing because of something beyond my control was even more frustrating than falling from my own mistake. I felt the fatigue overwhelming me and the doubt setting in. I knew that I had maybe missed my chance to make it.I took a breath, found a new beta, rested, and went for one final try. This time, in a full-on fight, shaking on each holds, everything finally came together. I clipped the anchor. I topped out the final pitch in thick fog, completely drained but deeply happy. What a journey!Many thanks to @jimzimmermann_massagemedical , my partner, who was extremely close to sending it, but the conditions during the last two days we had left were the worst of the trip : fog wrapped the cliff in humidity all day long. We’ll be back!I climbed all the pitches in lead. Route opened by David Tarragó, first freed by the @hermanospou in 2013, and later repeated by @edumarin1 , @sebertheclimber & @jorge.diazrullo. Thanks to all of them for the inspiration!📸 @melanie_nacnac @mammut @scarpa_de @alouette_cycles @baechlibergsport @morandconstructionsmetalliques @tcssectionjurassienne @scarpa_world

item.title: You’d think a frozen couloir would be the last place to feel calm. But for Franziska Schönbächler, i
item.description: You’d think a frozen couloir would be the last place to feel calm. But for Franziska Schönbächler, it’s the only place that makes sense. No noise. No pressure. Just the sound of her ice tools, the cold in her lungs, and the quiet reminder that she’s doing this for no one but herself. She’s still in the competition world - where every move is judged, every result matters, and the pressure to deliver never really lets up. Even at her best, she wondered: Was I climbing for me, or for everyone else?Head to our YT channel to watch the full episode.

item.title: Thirty years of pushing limits - Eiger Extreme Nordwand 6.0 is here. Developed with athletes. Design
item.description: Thirty years of pushing limits - Eiger Extreme Nordwand 6.0 is here. Developed with athletes. Designed for repair. Our pinnacle mountaineering collection is precision-engineered in every layer and made to last. Find out more at the link in our bio. #RisewiththeMountain

item.title: Sometimes, a frozen couloir is the only place that makes sense. No noise. No pressure. Just the soun
item.description: Sometimes, a frozen couloir is the only place that makes sense. No noise. No pressure. Just the sound of ice tools, the cold in your lungs, and the quiet reminder that you're doing this for no one but yourself. This is the case for @franziska_schoenbaechler who's still in the competition world – where every move is judged, every result matters. Even at her best, Franzi often asks herself: Am I climbing for me, or for everyone else?👉️ Check out LOCAL LEGENDS | Franziska Schönbächler on our YT channel now.

item.title: What if.. We had an ACTUAL Mountainwear Misuse Ranger team? 😱 Well, they’d have to start with traini
item.description: What if.. We had an ACTUAL Mountainwear Misuse Ranger team? 😱 Well, they’d have to start with training at our HQ obviously. And we couldn’t just take anybody. We’re going to need people like our lead guide @hamminator2017 and totally serious mountain sport athlete @katieburrelltv to do it… right? 📍Mammut HQ, Seon 🇨🇭 EP 1/6: THE PITCH.Stay tuned for more. 🏔️👮 #MountainwearRescue #NotAStreetwearBrand

item.title: The pressure is on 💥 ...So we called in @jakob.schubert to run our Mountainwear Rescue training like
item.description: The pressure is on 💥 ...So we called in @jakob.schubert to run our Mountainwear Rescue training like a proper drill sergeant.But the real question: what’s our high-flying CEO Heiko going to think? And who approved all of this, anyway? 🤔EP 2/6 🏔️👮‍♀️ #MountainwearRescue #NotAStreetwearBrand

item.title: POV: You hire a German designer 🙄This is what happens when you let the most German German @jannick.a
item.description: POV: You hire a German designer 🙄This is what happens when you let the most German German @jannick.apitz ever join your team. And of course he wants to talk about the Reissverschlussdurchrutschverhinderungsmechanismus… Say that three times fast.Function over fashion any day – if you ask a German anyway 😎🤘EP 3/6 🏔️🆘👮#MountainwearRescue #NotAStreetwearBrand
